short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you like Rick Ross or Santa Claus, this extension will improve your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This carefully selected suite of enhancements is sure to put a smile on the face of any serious hip-hop aficionado!  

The Browser Enhancement Pack was created by die-hard Rap/Hip-hop fans who believe that the modern browsing experience can be improved by applying the same techniques used by Rick Ross used in the studio to create numerous hit songs. This technique has been anecdotally confirmed to improve browsing focus.
